field.label: Match Type
field.help: Choose how to match on "URL Pattern".

field.label: Learning Mode
field.help: Enable learning mode means nothing is blocked but logged.

field.label: Block XSS Score
field.help: Block XSS with a score above the specified value using generic detection.

field.label: Block SQL Injection Score
field.help: Block SQL injection with a score above the specified value using generic detection.

field.label: Upstream Servers
field.help: Select an upstream to proxy to.

field.label: File System Root
field.help: Enter the file system root from which the files are served.

field.label: Index File
field.help: Enter a list of file extensions, which are served instead of a directory. It is common to use index.html or index.php here.

field.label: Automatic Index
field.help: Check this to serve a file list when a directory is requested. This is useful for serving multiple files with someone without a web application. It is recommended to use this option only with authentication.

field.label: Basic Authentication
field.help: Enter the realm for this directory and enable authentication.

field.label: Basic Credentials List
field.help: Select a credential list to use.

field.label: Enable Advanced ACLs
field.help: Send an authentication request to the OPNsense backend for advanced access control.
